Alloy Language Support.description: Basic support for the Alloy modeling language.

ASP.NET 5 Scripts Task Runner.description: Adds support for project.json's scripts in the Task Runner Explorer

Broccoli Task Runner.description: Adds support for Broccoli brocfile.js files as well as Ember-CLI's ember-cli-build.js build scripts based on Broccoli.

Bundler & Minifier.description: Adds support for bundling and minifying JavaScript, CSS and HTML files in any project.

Command Task Runner.description: Adds support for command line batch files in Visual Studio 2015's Task Runner Explorer. Supports .cmd, .bat, .ps1 and .psm1 files.

DartVS.description: Some support for coding Dart in Visual Studio.

EditorConfig.description: Loads editor options such as indentation sizes from standard, cross-platform .editorconfig files.

Extensibility Tools.description: An extension for making it easier to write Visual Studio extensions

Go Language Support.description: Basic support for the Go programming language.

Open Command Line.description: Opens a command line at the root of the project. Support for all consoles such as CMD, PowerShell, Bash etc. Provides syntax highlighting, Intellisense and execution of .cmd and .bat files.

Package Installer.description: Makes it easier, faster and more convenient than ever to install Bower, npm and JSPM packages to any project.

PHP Language Support.description: Basic support for the PHP programming language.

TypeWriter.description: Automatic TypeScript Template generation from C# files.

Web Compiler.description: The easiest and most powerful way to compile LESS, Scss and CoffeeScript files directly within Visual Studio or through MSBuild.

Yaml Editor.description: Provides a complete YAML editing experience in Visual Studio, including: - Syntax highlightning - Syntax error detection - Comment / uncomment selection - Format document

Add New File.description: The fastest and easiest way to add new files to any project - including files that start with a dot.
